name: Tippin' Tommy
description:
WELL TARNATION!

Take a trip to the Wild West with Tippin' Tommy, a cowboy plagued by other-thinking, as he stumbles through a gauntlet of nail-biting encounters on his trip back to his hometown.

Don't let your neuroses overcome you! Finesse the fine art of hat tappin', grabbin' and tippin' because your performance as a stylish cowboy will determine the outcome of each social interaction.

Tippin' Tommy is best played with gamepad, however mouse and keyboard are also supported.
